Please see the published Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC): Vaccination Status (DDCC:VS) and the Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC): Test Result (DDCC:TR, link forthcoming) Technical Specifications and Implementation Guidance for security and privacy considerations. In particular, see the following content:
minimum requirements for a DDCC,
assumptions,
ethical considerations and data protection principles,
functional and non-functional requirements,
national governance considerations, and
implementation considerations.
Also see the References and mapped functional requirements, available within the implementation guide.
